description: A React functional component named TaskList that renders a list of task items or an empty state message based on the provided tasks array. It uses the TaskListItem component to render individual tasks and handles user interactions via callbacks.

methods.name: TaskList({ tasks, onToggle, onUpdate, onDelete, filter, search })
methods.description: React functional component that displays a list of tasks or an empty state message when there are no tasks.

ctags.name: TaskList
ctags.pattern: /^export default function TaskList({ tasks, onToggle, onUpdate, onDelete, filter, search }) {$/
ctags.signature: ({ tasks, onToggle, onUpdate, onDelete, filter, search })
